page.title: 12AMENITIES IN TARRANT VALLEY
page.content: What is it like to live in our block as far as communications service and amenities are concerned? As only a small part of Tarrant Hinton is in our block we did not spend much time there but at least they are on a daily bus service which goes from Salisbury to Blandford.At Tarrant Launceston and Monkton there is a bus service but only twice a week,at 10 am on Thursdays and Saturdays to Blandford.This bus is very important to those people who have not got cars as it is the only chance they have to go shopping.The letters are collected twice a day and there is one delivery.The library van visits each village twice a week usually at 10 am in the morning.
